professional_experience.skill_keywords: Keywords: ALB, Angular, Apache Airflow, AWS Lambda, CI/CD Jenkins, CloudFormation, CloudWatch, CSS, Docker, Django, DynamoDB, ECS, EFG, EventBridge, FastAPI, Figma, Flask, FlaskAPI, Grafana, HTML, Kubernetes, NestJS, Node.js, OAuth (PoP, Bearer), Pandas, Postman, PostgreSQL, Pydantic, Python, Pytest, REST APIs, Redshift, Route53, S3, Step Functions, Splunk, Snowflake, SNS, Tableau, Terraform, TypeScript, etc.

projects.project_summary: Built decoupled and monolith web applications
project_details: Designed the Web UI/UX prototype with the Figma platform, and developed it into the real UI Pages (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap).
Designed and built monolithic web applications with Django and Flask frameworks from scratch within Docker containers(Linux-based operating system).
Built a robust, three-layer web architecture: Micro-Frontend (Angular, TypeScript, Lit.dev) for domain-based modular UI; Backend-for-Frontend (Node.js/NestJS, Flask) to aggregate and simplify APIs.
Designed scalable Python REST APIs with FastAPI and AWS Lambda for low-latency, serverless workloads.

Built and containerized Python microservices, automated CI/CD with Jenkins pipelines, and provisioned AWS with Terraform (e.g., SGs, IAM). Orchestrated services on Amazon ECS (Fargate) with autoscaling and CloudWatch monitoring.
Integrated event-driven workflows with SNS, S3, and DynamoDB to trigger downstream services (email alerts, data processing).

projects.project_summary: Designed and implemented an event-driven data processing system using AWS Lambda and EventBridge with AWS SAM.
project_details: Extract data from static storage(S3), real-time streams(Kafka)
Standardize heterogeneous source formats(CSV, JSON, Parquet, etc) into a unified schema using Python, with schema validation and quality checks integrated at ingestion
Load transformed datasets into Snowflake with a multi-layer architecture.
Developed and optimized the SQL queries for metrics visualization on Tableau.

projects.project_summary: Designed and built a scalable Apache Airflow platform supporting CI/CD-based onboarding for internal users.
project_details: Deployed Apache Airflow to Amazon ECS with a custom Docker image and ECS Service autoscaling, ensuring elastic capacity for webserver/scheduler/workers.

Built an event-driven DAG onboarding pipeline: repositories opt in by declaring the dag-job-onboarding gear in the user's Bogiefile. Once PR is merged, Jenkins triggers the AWS Lambda that copies DAGs from the repo to a shared Amazon EFS mount consumed by Airflow.
Wired Airflow to the EFS DAG directory so the UI refreshes automatically and new DAGs appear within secondsâ€”no manual redeploys.
Led the successful migration of legacy data-processing jobs from third-party systems to internal platforms.
Created detailed roadmaps, defined scope boundaries, and executed stakeholder alignment across multiple LOBs.
Delivered production-ready migration solutions with POC validation, phased rollout, and full documentation.
Hosted knowledge-sharing sessions to onboard cross-functional teams and standardize platform usage.

Facilitated Agile ceremonies as Scrum Master, including daily stand-ups, sprint planning, backlog refinement, and sprint retrospectives, ensuring continuous delivery and process improvement across sprints.
Coached team members on Agile best practices to improve collaboration, transparency, and delivery velocity.
Guided teams in designing modular, scalable, and user-centric API platforms aligned with OpenAPI standards and OAuth security models.
Built a Golang-based URL commission tracking service with REST APIs and secure token authentication.
Developed daily ingestion pipelines using Python to process affiliate data at scale.
Wrote automated tests with Pytest and Golang's native testing tools.
Provisioned S3 data lake infrastructure using AWS CloudFormation and automated data movement to Redshift, Cassandra, and MySQL via AWS Glue.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using CircleCI, Jenkins, and Ansible; deployed containerized services via EC2 and ELB.
Instrumented system metrics and alerts with Prometheus, CloudWatch, Datadog, and Periscope.
Developed Python libraries and Django REST APIs for data ingestion into Elasticsearch and S3.
Created AngularJS-based frontends with AJAX integrations and dynamic data rendering.
Built scalable Java Spring Boot microservices and managed Nginx/Gunicorn web servers on EC2 Linux instances.
Delivered full-stack web apps using PHP Symfony and built REST APIs to support automated testing workflows.
Created and executed Selenium-based test suites and processed XML data using MSSQL stored procedures.
Administered Jenkins for CI/CD pipelines and provided Python training for internal teams.
Presented best practices in CI/CD at Cutting Edge 2014.
Developed core Python libraries and automated test frameworks for Java/QT applications.
Built QT-based mobile apps and Java SWT desktop apps.
Wrote Ruby-based UI automation for QT, running under Jenkins and Robot Framework.
Participated in Agile teams and documented progress via JIRA.

education.degree: Master's In Systems Engineering and Management

education.institution: University of Electronic Science and Technology of China
education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science
